page.title: 10EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The diversity of industry in the area covers a wide field providing employment for skilled and unskilled workers.The principal industries are motor,engineering,textiles,civil engin- eering,building,telecommunications equipment and vehicles.Large numbers of local people work at Leyland Motors, Leyland Chorley Ordnance Factory (Euxton)and the rubber and paint works at Chorley.Traditional textile indust- ries have been replaced by advanced technology industries.Many older industries are situated along the rail- way and Leeds Liverpool Canal,while smaller works are located on the edge of town.The employment structure is continually changing.Unemployment rose steadily from 5%-'79 to l0%-'8l.May figures for Chorley-4004 unemp.approx l9%School survey revealed 33% unemp. 33% unemp.men 50% unemp.women.
